articles.title: Some Antarctic ice shelves have GROWN in the last 20 years despite global warming - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sea ice, pushed against ice shelves by a change in regional wind patterns, may have helped to protect these ice shelves from losses, according to researchers led by Cambridge University.
